CDK9 inhibition assay uses CDK 9/cell cycleProtein T1 complex (8nM) and "5-FAM-CDK 9 tide" peptide substrate (2. mu.M, synthetic fluorophore-tagged peptide with the sequence 5-FAM-GSRTPMY (SEQ ID No.2) -NH<sub>2</sub>5-FAM is as defined above and NH<sub>2</sub>Representing a C-terminal amide) and containing 10mM MgCl in the buffer composition listed above<sub>2</sub>.
CDK12 inhibition assay Using CDK12(aa 686-1082)/cyclin K complex (50nM) and "5-FAM-CDK 9 tide" (2. mu.M) as defined above, and containing 2mM MgCl in the buffer composition listed above<sub>2</sub>.
The CDK2 inhibition assay used the CDK 2/cyclin E1 complex (0.5nM) and the "5-FAM-CDK 7 tide" (2. mu.M) as defined above, and contained 2mM MgCl in the buffer compositions listed above<sub>2</sub>.
